item.title: Test
item.description: Objective The purpose of this blah blah ############################## # - Load librairies ############################## library(dplyr) library(ggplot2) library(plotly) library(gapminder) library(knitr) library(kableExtra) library(RCurl) myfile <- getURL('https://sakai.unc.edu/access/content/group/3d1eb92e-7848-4f55-90c3-7c72a54e7e43/public/data/bycatch.csv', ssl.verifyhost=FALSE, ssl.verifypeer=FALSE) df <- read.csv(textConnection(myfile), header=T) testing df %>% group_by(Season) %>% summarise(test = mean(Tows)) %>% kable Season test 1989-90 42.28571 1990-91 48.80000 1991-92 30.37500 1992-93 46.
